## Setup

```{r}
library(rothSGA)
dir = '{{{ data_dir }}}'
```

## Annotate Images

```{r}
screenmill::annotate(dir)
add_biological_replicates(dir)
```

## Calibrate, review, and quantify colonies

```{r}
screenmill::calibrate(dir)
screenmill::review(dir)
screenmill::measure(dir)
```

## Apply normalizations

```{r}
screenmill::read_screenmill(dir) %>%
  apply_spatial_effect_normalization() %>%
  apply_plate_normalization()
```

## Aggregate and summarise technical replicates

```{r}
summarize_normalized_data()
```

## Quality control

```{r}
check_self_crosses(dir)
check_dead_strains(dir)
check_query_sensitivity_to_drug(dir)
plot_sm_data(dir)
```
